# Joyful Noise (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius emanation centered on you

**Duration:** Concentration; see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 127

*You stomp your foot on the ground, creating a ripple of noise that unleashes suppressed sounds behind it.*

You create sonic vibrations that negate any magical *[[Silence (Spell)|silence]]* effect in the area. This zone of negation moves with you and lasts as long as you continue to concentrate.

The *[[Silence (Spell)|silence]]* effect is not dispelled but simply held in abeyance; it remains in effect outside the area of the *joyful noise* effect.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1, Sorcerer 1, Wizard 1 to Level.
